items.title: Brady touts Coleman: 'Stood on the table' for WR
items.description: New Bills coach Joe Brady expressed his support for wide receiver Keon Coleman, stating that "Keon Coleman is going to be a Buffalo Bill."

items.title: Pats Vrabel 'not' too worried about Maye's health
items.description: Patriots coach Mike Vrabel said Thursday that he's not too concerned about QB Drake Maye's injured shoulder as the team begins preparations for Super ...

items.title: Sources: Hayes, Bryant accept slam dunk invites
items.description: Lakers center Jaxson Hayes and Spurs rookie Carter Bryant have accepted invitations to the NBA slam dunk contest at All-Star Weekend in Los Angeles, s...

items.title: Sources: Nuggets' Gordon to miss 4-to-6 weeks
items.description: Denver Nuggets forward Aaron Gordon will be reevaluated in four to six weeks with a right hamstring strain, the team announced on Thursday.

items.title: KU expects Peterson to play vs. BYU, Dybantsa
items.description: Kansas expects to have Darryn Peterson available Saturday when the No. 14 Jayhawks welcome A.J. Dybantsa and No. 13 BYU to Allen Fieldhouse.
